author: Lauren Davidson
title: What is Black Friday, when is it and what are the best deals?
text: Retail and Consumer What is Black Friday, when is it and what are the best deals? There are still six weeks left to go until Black Friday, but you can never be too prepared. Here's everything you need to know. It's Black and it's back. Photo: Reuters
